## Latin Squares

```{r}
library(minionator)

a <- Latin$new(3)
print(a)
```

```{r}
library(rminion)

minion(a)
```

## Enumerate Latin squares of size at most 5

c.f. https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Latin_square

```{r}
latin_count <- function(n) minion(Latin$new(n))
counts <- do.call("rbind", lapply(1:5, latin_count))
knitr::kable(counts)
```
